data.text: Berlin's average temperature in July is perfect to discover this vibrant city on foot. #TriviaThursday http://t.co/CAhnEBDxt3

Clue 5: According to the NY Times the City is still divided but "not between East and West... but between serious and fun." #TriviaThursday
Clue 4: The city used to be in two countries. #TriviaThursday
Clue 3: #Condor doesn't fly directly from North America to this city but it can be reached by Rail or connecting flights. #TriviaThursday
Clue 2: The city we are looking for is in Germany. #TriviaThursday
Clue 1: Today's #triviaThursday #Condor destination has this average temperature throughout the year. http://t.co/YTK2j6Dq1u
